However, the machine began to shake out of control, various colors of light flashes around you, and heavy smoke fills up the air. You start coughing and yelled "What...cough...is...cough...going...cough...on here!" You were also thrown all over the place as the malfuncting machine continues to rock and roll. (no pun indeed)

"AHHHHHH!!!!!!!!" you screamed as the machine let out a loud humming sound and after that, everything is silent once again as the machine stops.

"I'm I still....still alive?" you asked yourself. You slowly approached the door and knock on it. Did it work?

You quickly stepped away as the door slowly opens. You were nervous about this as you shut your eyes. "I hope I don't end up in an empty dimension or something after all that ruckus." you said.

141.content:
The new world in front of you was not the suburban area you saw on the screen, instead you were looking at a lush jungle that you were currently on. "This isn't want I wanted to go. Did the faults in my machine sent me here by accident?" you wondered in your head and make your first into this strange world.

The plants of this jungle looks huge, but they also look a bit weird too. Many of the trees have no branches at all; they're basically tall, skinny, and completely green. The ones that do have branches were taller than the ones without them. The branches were the same color as the trunks (green); they were round and flat. On the top of those trees, they each have what looks like colorful petals. "What the heck? Why do they look like flowers?" you asked yourself. There's no way a flower can grow that tall unless they were as old as trees back in your world. "Well this is a new world after all." You walk towards your machine and press a button on the left side. It soon shrinks down and becomes pocket-sized. You put the now mini-sized machine in your pocket to make sure you don't lose it. Now that you are ready, you start your journey across this jungle.

With the exceptions of birds singing, the whole place is strangely quiet as you walk forward. You suspect that sooner or later, a wild predator is lurking around here getting ready to pounce on you in a few second. Aren't jungles supposed to be humid and warm? It is pretty warm though, but there was some bit of a cool breeze blowing around you. This feels more temperate than tropical; you kinda wonder if this is not really a jungle, but a rather weird type of forest since it's a new world and all.

You were about to settle and take a break on a random spot when suddenly, you briefly hear something within this forest. You stood there and listen carefully at the mysterious sound and it sounds like voices but not just any voices, it sounded like singing along with music. "There's people around here too?" you asked from inside your head "But why would anyone sing and make music in a place like this?" You decided to go and investigate yourself while listening carefully to the song.

The music was slowly getting louder and louder as you go and can make it out more clearly. It sounds like it's sung by a young female that was accompanied by pop music. "Okay, I'm not sure why would anybody sing pop music in the middle of a forest like this, but I better get to the bottom of this." you said. Suddenly, a loud buzzing sound is heard from above as a large shadow swept past you. "What the hell was that?!" you said in surprise "Was that a bird? No way, birds don't buzz. Was that a bug? No way, bugs are not huge." You just ignored it and continue to search for the source of the music.

You were getting closer because the music was now louder than ever. At the corner of your eye, you saw what looks like a giant structure; it must be someone's house or something and that's were they are singing. You brush off the strange plant in front of you and finally got a better look at the structure, and that's were you noticed something very off about it.

The "house" looks nothing like one at all, instead it looks more like a huge boombox. You first thought it was house, but you hear the music coming from the speakers rather than from inside it like an actual boombox. It was so big that you thought it was some kind of a house that happens to looks like one. That's not the only odd thing you noticed. You were so focused on looking ahead that you didn't saw another strange thing above you as the whole location you were on is now covered in a large shadow plus the singing happens to come from there instead of the giant boombox. You look up to see a giant yellow..thing that was floating from above. "What is that? A UFO?" you asked out loud. You now have so many questions in your head that you believe that your head was going to explode at this moment. You quickly approach and climb on one of the plants to get a better look at this world right now because you seriously want to know what's going on around here. You didn't bother to look around while climbing, you just want to wait until you get to the top. It took you a good 10 or so seconds to get on top of this tree and finally you got a bit of a better look of this new world.

When you did, you NEVER expected to see something like this.

First things first, you are not in a jungle or any type of forest. You were in the same place you wanted to go; which was the suburbia that you saw in the screen as you saw a row of houses and other things. Second, this place is humongous! Is this world supposed to be like this to outsiders like yourself or did the bug in your machine shrink you down to nearly the size of a flea? You don't believe it what you are looking at, you were so tiny that you mistook the front yard for a jungle. And finally, you turn around to see who was singing the song you heard earlier.

And there, you saw HER!

Sitting on top of the gigantic beach chair (the object that was "floating" above you is in fact that) and singing rather loudly was a giant girl. She appears to be a 16 year old teenager with short blonde hair which was pretty frizzy. The only thing she's wearing is a pink-green bikini which means she's probably sunbathing and singing at the same time. All you could do was stare in shock at sight you witnessed; it was in fact an inhabitant of this enormous world who in the eyes of the others, is just a normal teenage girl, but in your eyes, she was the biggest thing you ever see.

The girl continues to sing very loudly which caused you to take out some pieces of cotton (why would you take them with you is a mystery) and put them in your ears. It still noisy but at least it's not enough to damage your eardrum. You still watch this girl sing the songs from the boombox and you gotta admit she does look very attractive for a teen girl.

Should you get a closer look at her and explore around her for uh....research? Or just stay hidden at the moment?

155322213.content:
You blinked, flabbergasted. You still couldn't quite believe it had worked.

The ship you had built, which took an eternity and a lot of work (and money), had actually been able to leave your actual reality behind so you could finally satisfy your lust for adventure... in another realm!

You were in your ship when a blinding light that had forced you to close your eyes shone.

You recalled feeling excited, and that you had wondered where you were going... if you were going anywhere, of course. There was the possibility that your ship wasn't actually working after all...

The blinding light had eventually died down, allowing you to open your eyes to see that you were... in a place you didn't recognize.

Curious about where your ship had brought you, you had jumped out to inspect your surroundings better.

And, from what you could tell, you were now in a gigantic house.

A giant kitchen, a giant TV in front of a giant bed, everything was absolutely massive!

You were left a bit perplexed for two reasons: one, you wondered where were you. And two... how did you shrink(you assumed you had shrunken)?. You knew your ship could shrink down to microscopic sizes, so it was undoubtedly its fault... what you didn't know was that it could do it on its own.

Probably something went wrong, but you quickly told yourself that you didn't care. What was more adventurous than being tiny and in an unknown place?

Also, you mused while cracking a smile, maybe you could get the chance to fulfill a secondary dream of yours and meet a giant girl...

Little did you know that your dream was about to become a reality.

Your attention was drawn when you heard an unfamiliar sound.

"Urgh..." someone groaned, the voice echoing around the empty house you had appeared in.

You turned your head around, wondering who was it. And, almost immediately, your gaze fell on the cause of that groan... and your jaw hung open.

Standing in the middle of the house, having apparently came out from nowhere, was a gigantic, slim girl, with a hand over her forehead and a stressed expression over her face.

Not only from your point of view, this girl was very tall, and wore a sleeveless blue shirt with a star on her chest area with a ribbon tied around her waist; she wore amber shorts and pink socks with blue shoes. Also, she had azure eyes and peach pink hair that pointed backwards.

But what really struck you was the girl's extremely pale skin and the gem in the middle of her forehead.

If you had to guess, you'd say it was a...

Pearl.

Your heart skipped a beat as your brain put two and two together. Finally, you realized where your ship had brought you: you were in Steven Universe! And the 'girl' you were staring at was no other than Pearl!

You felt shocked. Was this all a dream? Maybe your ship didn't actually work and you were just dreaming...

To make sure, you pinched yourself and groaned slightly at the lingering pain in your arm.

No, you were wide awake.

And you were really in the Steven Universe show, in presence of one of the main characters!

--

After yet another day of training, Pearl felt exhausted.

She and the Crystal Gems were improving massively, and she was particularly proud of Steven's progress in combat.

However, all the Gem wished for right now was to rest, if only for five minutes, before getting back to training.

Garnet and Amethyst had gone into their rooms while Steven, the son of the former leader of the Crystal Gems Rose Quartz, had opted to go with his friend Connie.

As for Pearl, she had decided to just rest in the house for a while waiting for Steven to return, happily unaware of the other, tiny human that currently rested on the couch of the beach house...

But, vice versa, you had noticed that Pearl was coming right your way.

You saw the titanic Gem walking towards what you had figured out to be a large couch.

And you suddenly realized what Pearl intended to do when she turned around, apparently not having noticed you on the couch, and presented you her backside.

"Oh..." you said, flushing red, before urgently realizing that the giantess was about to sit straight on you!

"Hey! Pearl, down here!" you exclaimed in alert while the great butt above began its descent towards you...
155322213.title: Giant Gem

choices: Pearl moved you towards her mouth...
Pearl moved you towards her backside...
Pearl moved you to the front side of her shorts...
1553222131.content:
The moment the scream left your mouth, time seemed to slow down; Pearl's behind stopped in mid-air, its large shadow obscuring your tiny form completely.

The slim Gem hesitated, sure she heard someone calling her.

From your angulation, you saw her head turning left-to-right and right-to-left as she tried to spot whoever called out to her.

Nothing.

The house was deserted aside from her.

"Down here!"

"Huh?"

Finally the giantess stood back to her full height and turned her head backwards.

It took her no time to notice your ship, which was resting beside you; it took her a few seconds more to notice you.

You stared up in the sky-blue eyes of the giantess and she stared straight back at you, her expression becoming one of disbelief as she realized that she was staring at what appeared to be an extremely tiny human.

She and her fellow Gems had spent a few millennia on Earth, but this was the first time she saw something such as a human that small!

"... Maybe I've been doing too much training lately..." she concluded, sure that she was being victim of a hallucination.

"Wh- No!" you said,
"I'm real, I swear!"

Pearl blinked in confusion - what was going on?

You watched as the giantess hesitantly turned around, extending her long, slender arm towards where you were standing.

You stood still as five, pale fingers wrapped around your body, leaving your head out of Pearl's fist.

The Gem giantess slowly brought her hand up to her face and finally spoke her first question... questions,

"Who are you? Why are you so small? And what are you doing in this place?" she asked, her voice becoming quite threatening.

She couldn't be sure of your purpose here and, albeit you didn't look like you could cause much trouble - if any trouble at all - Steven's safety came first. She had to make sure you didn't represent a threat.

You smiled awkwardly - this one part was going to be hard to explain. And harder for Pearl to believe.

"Hehehe..." you laughed nervously, trying to shake off the thought that, if you picked the wrong words, you were going to be stomped to dust,
"Y'see, I'm a normal person!... Well, aside from me being so small..." you muttered.

Pearl remained deadpan.

"... Anyway, I, uh... have no clue why I'm so small. Apparently, my ship there-" you pointed to the now toy-sized ship,
"... Had been malfunctioning and shrunk me to this size. It's what brought me here, too."

Pearl let your words sink in, before offering a nod. Her expression didn't change though.

"But WHY are you even here? You're not trying to cause trouble, ARE you?" she inquired.

"... No no, nothing like that!" you hastily defended,
"I didn't even know I'd end up here! The ships just brought me here, I swear."

Pearl didn't reply, but stared at you with those azure eyes of hers piercing straight through your soul like her gaze was one of her spears, which she handled with deadly accuracy; for a minute or so, the Gem giantess didn't say a word, trying to figure if you did represent a threat or not.

But, in the end, she let out a sigh, deciding to believe you, seeing no reason not to. However, she told herself, you were going to regret it if she ever found that yours were all lies.

"... Okay," she said,
"I guess I can trust you... for now."

The fist you were being held into opened, and you found yourself sitting in Pearl's pale palm.

She bent, gently grabbing your ship from the couch before sitting down.

"So, you're saying this brought you here..." she recalled.

"Yup."

"... Where are you from? I've seen quite a few of your kind, but no one this small." Pearl continued.

"Well, I'm... not from around here, that's for sure," you replied,
"I don't think I'm even from this universe. That was the ship was for, interdimensional travel."

Having been in space quite a few times, Pearl wasn't new to hearing this kind of things.

"Why even build something like that?" she questioned, before offering a smile,
"That's incredible for human standards anyway. I'm impressed."

"Thanks." you said, mentally praising yourself for handling the situation so well,
"I built that for... y'know, to have some fun! I guess I didn't expect the shrinking part, but well, I guess that's pretty fun too. I mean, things are weird like this, everything's gigantic!"

The Gem who currently held you stared at you, speechless. Not once you had showed fear of being so small, she mused with some admiration. You were one brave human.

"Fun." she repeated, looking away from you,
"With all the training we've been doing, we can't afford to think about having fun." she admitted.

You smiled.

"Well, it doesn't seem you're too busy right now," you said,
"Why don't you try to enjoy yourself now?"

Pearl turned her head to fix those shining blue eyes of hers on you again. The suggestion was one she wanted to laugh at... before thinking that it wasn't a terrible idea.

It sounded pretty good actually, when was the last time she had fun without thinking about training, training Steven and Connie, fighting...?

You were right, she had her mind free from all that stuff right now... and she had a tiny human completely at her mercy.

"You know, that actually sounds great," she praised, before expression shifted into a grin. One you never saw on her face in the show you had ended up in,
"But I will need your help."

Something in your head, like a faint voice, told you that you should have started worrying, but you ignored it and shut it up.

"Sure," you replied, eager to find out what the Gem had in mind.

"That's great!" the pale giantess chimed, before blushing a bit. Oddly, her cheeks became blue instead of red.
"That's actually the first time I try something like this..."

The voice from before came back to your mind, but you paid more attention to the fact that Pearl's hand was moving, bringing you along with it.

You hastily took notice of where you were headed.

15532221311.content:
Your world rose up as Pearl lifted her pale palm up in the air, holding it still in front of her blushing face,

"So, as I mentioned, this is the first time I try this and... ew... the idea disgusts me," she said, adopting a disgusted expression on her face, before shaking it off,
"But I wonder..."

She didn't finish her sentence, but brought you to her lips, before she hesitated a moment.

You saw her lips quivering and her blush deepening and, for some reason, you initially believed she was going to kiss you.

Being kissed by a Gem, that would be... you didn't know, nice?

All your thoughts were interrupted when you saw Pearl's lips opening wide as she brought you closer, letting you see the pink insides of her mouth.

"Whoa!" you shouted,
"What are you doing!?"

Instantly, Pearl shut her mouth.

"I'm... I'm doing what you suggested..." she meekly told.

"I told you to enjoy yourself, not eat me!" you protested.

Pearl rose a shoulder as she shrugged.

"I'm sorry, I kind of wanted to... experiment with you a bit. That's not how I usually enjoy myself, believe me, but you're this size and-" she trailed off to sigh,
"Look, I'm not too fond of humans. I mean, it's not like I hate them, but there's this human- forget it. Point is, I'm fascinated by your anatomy. I just want to try something, alright?"

"At all!" you exclaimed, pointing to her stomach,
"I'd die if I went in there!"

Pearl smiled.

"Pft, that's not true. Gems' bodies may look like a human bodies, but they're made of light and can't process food... I mean, I think since Amethyst does eat... point is, we certainly can't digest a human being, meaning that you'll safe even if inside of me or any other Gem that might want to... you know..." she explained, blushing again.

You still didn't look convinced despite Pearl's words and reassuring smile.

"Yeah but..."

Pearl cut you off by bringing you closer to her face,

"Trust me, you will be safe." she said,
"Now, may I...?"

You sighed.

"If you say I'll be safe..."

"You will. Now..."

Pearl didn't wait any longer and slowly brought you to her mouth, pushing you inside just as slowly.

A thin layer of saliva instantly coated you from head to toe while Pearl began tasting you.

"Ew... this is... weird..." she said, starting to understand how Amethyst felt when eating. In her case, she disliked it but decided to go on with it anyway.

"S-So, ready?" she asked after a while of tasting your tiny form.

You sighed, still unsure about this, but figuring that you were far too deep in the rabbit hole to chicken out now.

"Yes... go on..." you said after a moment of hesitation.

Immediately after the words left your mouth, Pearl's own oral cavity sprang back to life as her tongue moved beneath you, moving you to the back end of the pink wet cave, where a small hole, big enough to take you in, was.

You were moved to it slowly, before your arm was caught by it, then your head and shortly your whole body followed, leading you to the next step: the Gem's esophagus.

After swallowing, Pearl kept a finger on the lump in her throat, before something caught her attention: the ship you left behind.

Quietly, she grabbed it and moved it to her forehead, where her gem glowed and sucked the vehicle within itself as she stored it away.

She didn't want Amethyst or Steven, mainly Amethyst though, to break it by accident.

--

Tight.

That's how you would describe your situation if anyone asked.

Despite Pearl's words about her body being made of light, the muscles around you felt quite solid and slowly, very slowly dragged you down to the next step in the digestive system: the stomach.

With the giantess being a Gem and all, you wondered how her stomach was made and you were surprised to find, a minute later, that it was pretty similar to any other stomach... at least from the way they described it since you never actually saw one from the inside before.

When you finally reached the bottom of Pearls throat, a sma, wrinkled opening became large enough to let you pass through and fall right into a pool of a colorless steaming liquid that filled up all the... fleshy?... room.

You sank into it for a second, before surfacing, soaked to the bone, but unharmed.

"I can't feel you anymore." Pearl's voice came from the outside, echoing all around you.

"I'm in your stomach!" you replied, wondering if she could hear you,
"Are you sure I won't be... 'processed'?"

"Don't worry." was Pearl's reply, suggesting she could hear you just fine.

Minutes passed and the liquid around you, as you discovered, didn't hurt or burn at all. It felt like regular water, despite the steam, like you were inside of a gigantic pot.

After a while, the Gem whose stomach you were in spoke again,

"Hey," she said,
"I was wondering, would you do something else for me that you're in there?" she asked.

You wondered what she wanted.

"What is it?"

155322213112.content:
Glad she could still hear your voice even if you were inside of her body, Pearl placed a hand on what was supposed to be the stomach's location according to human anatomy.

She still couldn't quite believe any of this was happening, but since it apparently was, she might as well get to the bottom of what she started.

"I'd like you..." she began telling,
"To move further within my body and describe what you see in every detail."

"Really?" you asked.

"Yes... I-I mean, if you are willing of course! If not, I'll try to get you back out..." Pearl hastily said, wondering what would happen if Garnet used her future sight and saw a tiny, unwilling human deep within her fellow Gem's body.

As for you, you pondered your choices for a moment, before deciding you didn't see any harm in doing what the giantess asked since you were inside of her already.

After all, Pearl may have looked like one, but she wasn't human: exploring her from the inside could be fascinating and, well, you did come here searching for an adventure.

"Okay, I will." you replied.

Hearing the affirmative response from her tummy, Pearl smiled.

"Great, I'm sure this will be a fascinating experience for the both of us. You are the first human to explore a Gem from within, remember that." she said.

"Uh, yeah." you replied before looking at the pool you were swimming in, trying to see where the entrance to Pearl's intestines was, but you couldn't see anything below the 'water' due a thick steam emanating from it, despite it not digesting you.

So you had to hold your breath and dive.

The liquid stung your eyes a bit, but you were otherwise fine and could move with ease.

Soon enough, you spotted a wrinkled orifice which, you supposed, was what you were searching for and swam to it, beginning to pry it open with your hands.

Outside, the Gem you were in felt a tingle in her stomach and blushed, before hastily looking around, deciding to move to her own room: if Steven, or worse one of the other Crystal Gems, came in right now and saw her like this, she wasn't sure what she would tell.

As for you, after a bit of an effort, you finally managed to open up the entrance to Pearl's intestines and slid right through, ending up in tighter place that was damp with the liquid you just got away from.

It was very dark and very tight in here, though you did somewhat expect it since you were... well, in someone's digestive system. It was, however, harder than you expected: the 'muscles' around you were quite hard.

You wondered if it was because Pearl was actually a Gem.

"Pearl, I've moved further!" you informed, receiving no response from the giantess.

Outside, Pearl unlocked her room with her gem and entered, luckily before anyone came in.

Once inside, she breathed in relief and focused back on her stomach, from which came the voice of the tiny human she found.

"Sorry, what was that?" she asked.

"Wonderful! Make sure to tell me every little detail!" she instructed.

"Um... it's dark, and tight, and a little damp." you told her,
"And it's... really hard on my back..."

"Okay. Continue, please."

"I'm afraid that'll take a while," you replied, feeling your hard surrounding squeezing you,
"This is called digestion: it'll take a while for you to 'process' me, in which point I'll come out from the other end."

Pearl put a hand over her mouth - she didn't expect this to take very long.

"Um... how long is it gonna take, exactly?" she asked.

As much as intriguing as this was, she couldn't just put her duties aside for you. Whenever Steven came back (which would hopefully take a while), whether you were still inside or not, she'd have to focus on training.

"A couple hours at most." you replied.

"Well... okay." the giantess' voice echoed around you.

She decided to just sit down in the meantime and hoped that no one would bother her for the next couple of hours.

It felt very weird to have a living person inside of her. Was this what Amethyst felt when she ate food? No, Pearl told herself, food wasn't alive. And didn't talk. Nor agree to do stuff like this.

"... Glad you're enjoying yourself." she said.

You were about to reply, when you noticed that your surroundings have grown slicker.

You questioned about it out loud.

"You must be nearing my stomach..." Pearl said, placing a hand on her belly.

"Hm." you replied. This little ride you had gone through was almost at the end. The only thing you wondered about was, how were you going to get out of Pearl?

The illusionary muscles around you grew slicker and slicker as you traveled further up the Gem, until you reached yet another little hole.

You could feel it pulsing in darkness, you could see it even, your eyes having adjusted to the shadows.

Yet again, the procedure began: the hole began pulsing around the top of your head, only to slowly take in your whole skull... this time, something was different.

The moment your head went through the opening, you knew that you were submerged into some kind of liquid.

It wasn't hard to figure out what it was.

Hastily, you closed your mouth and began squirming, encouraging the hole to take the rest of you inside the stomach. You weren't sure if Pearl's acids could digest you, but you could surely enough drown if you were left without oxygen for long enough.

Luckily, as if Pearl's body was responding to your fidgeting, it began sucking you inside more quickly.

It wasn't long before you were taken fully in and could swim to surface, letting your lungs fill with air again.

"Pearl?" you called,
"I'm in your stomach. How do I get out of here?" you asked while glancing around the chamber.

You noticed that it was no different than a normal stomach... you guessed, since you didn't actually see a stomach from inside before.

You felt the place shake lightly behind you and assumed that Pearl was patting her stomach from the outside.

"I think I know. Never had to do this before though, so I don't know if it'll work..." she said.

"... Should I worry?"

There was a giggle from outside, but it sounded much like it was forced.

"No no, my stomach isn't really made to digest food... I think... I mean, I don't eat any actual food!" she said,
"I found it rather repulsive, but I'm curious about this..."

Everything went quiet after the last remark and you heard Pearl grunting, as if she was focusing.

Then, suddenly, you felt weird... and, around you, a sky-blue bubble appeared, enclosing you.

"W-Wha...?" you told in surprise, before the bubble began rising, bringing you upwards, towards the opening that lead to Pearl's esophagus.

"D-Did it work?" Pearl asked.

"I... think?" you replied.

You flew into the opening and found yourself in a tight passage; you began flying up, your bubble rubbing along the smooth walls before you rose up past Pearl's uvula and into her mouth.

It was then that your bubble popped and the mouth opened, tilting and allowing you to slide forward, into the light...

A pale, petite hand caught you.

After being trapped in a dark place for hours, you were momentarily blinded by the light.

"So, ehm..." the giantess spoke while you slowly opened your eyes again to see her smiling warmly at you, her cheeks once more growing a deep shade of blue,
"Have you... had fun?"

You returned the smile.

"Yeah," you admitted,
"It was an adventure I was searching for, and this was definitely interesting, to see a body from the inside."

Pearl's smile widened, as did her blush.

"Glad to hear that."
155322213122.title: A tour through Pearl

choices: Garnet wanted you to explore her from the outside
Garnet wanted you to explore her from the inside
1553222131223.content:
"So? What now?" you asked the Gem giantess who held you in the middle of her palm while she stared down at you with that smile of hers.

"Well, I don't quite know now..." Pearl admitted,
"I was curious about that, and I have to admit it had been some experience, but I'm not really sure now... Hey, now that I think about it, you're a human. You're probably hungry now,"

You were about to reply when you realized that, having been trapped in someone's digestive system for hours, yours felt understandably empty now.

So you offered a nod.

"Well, I don't really eat, so I don't know much about cooking, but I'm sure we'll find something that can satisfy you." Pearl said, getting up from the couch.

You saw her hesitating, before she turned around, grabbing your ship from the couch.

"And let's put this somewhere safer. Wouldn't want Amethyst to break it..." Pearl muttered.

You mentally agreed.

But, before she could take a step, a noise filled the empty house, drawing both your and her attention.

Again, much like Pearl did earlier, a girl appeared in the middle of the house.

This one was taller than Pearl and had dark red skin; she had a red and black body and dark hair. She wore what appeared to be sunglasses.

You recognized her. So did Pearl.

"Garnet..." the Gem mumbled, before looking at you, only to then hide both you and your ship behind her back, sweat running down her face.

She wasn't sure how Garnet was going to react at the discovery that she was currently a tiny, (seemingly) harmless human.

As for the current leader of the Crystal Gems, she walked nonchalantly through the house, heading straight towards Pearl.

"O-Oh, Garnet... hey..." Pearl began.

The fusion of Ruby and Sapphire stopped.

"You don't need to hide him, Pearl," Garnet spoke calmly,
"I saw into the future. I saw myself discovering you with a shrunken human."

Pearl bit her lip - she had forgotten Sapphire's ability to see into the future.

"I'm not..." Pearl trailed off, seeing it pointless to hide someone from someone who already knew about that other someone... Pearl felt confused because of her line of thinking, but quickly shook her head.
"Okay. I AM holding an incredibly small human right now..." she confessed.

You felt your current perch moving as Pearl moved you from behind her back, showing you to Garnet.

The red titaness' height alone was so impressive that you felt both amazed and intimidated.

"Hel-lo?" you stuttered.

Garnet seemed to stared down at you for a second, before she turned to look at her fellow Gem.

"Pearl. What if he's a threat? To us? To Steven?" she spoke, folding her arms.

"I-"

"I don't see how he could be," Pearl retorted, interrupting you. At the same time, she pulled out your ship from behind her back and brought it to her forehead, her gem shining for a second as your ship was absorbed and stored inside.
"He's too small."

"He could be small because he wants it. We don't know how many more powers he's got." Garnet insisted.

"He's just a human, Garnet... albeit a very clever one..." Pearl reasoned... before giving off a small gasp; indeed, if you were clever enough to build a ship for interdimensional travel, who knew what more you could be up to?

Pearl hesitated. She didn't really see you as a threat, but what if she was wrong?

"... Tell you what," she said,
"Look into the future again. If he's a threat, we'll dispose of him."

The ruthless suggestion made you go pale as the palm you were on.

"I am not!" you retorted, nervous while glaring at Pearl. Didn't she believe you earlier!?

Garnet ignored your current anger to focus.

Your gaze went to her, and you awaited for a full minute, though it seemed much longer when Garnet adjusted her sunglasses and smiled.

"I don't see him doing anything that could damage us," she said calmly, causing you to sigh in relief and Pearl to smile,
"But there's something: you seem to have a certain interest, right? I saw Amethyst... never mind."

You looked up, noticing Garnet's hand, which had a gem on its palm, coming down to grab you from Pearl.

"I want to try it." by now, the towering fusion was blushing, and she began carrying you away from your original guardian.

Pearl too blushed, knowing what her friend and leader was up to. She let her, albeit she was a bit disappointed.

You, however, still felt unsure of what Garnet was up to.

"Uh..." you hesitated,
"I'm sorry, but... what are you... talking about?"

Garnet smirked.
1553222131223.title: Future sight

choices: Garnet spat you out, wanting you to try a different 'entrance'...
15532221312232.content:
"You know what I saw in my vision?" Garnet asked upon hearing your question, her smirk glued to her face.

Her expression was somewhat unnerving, but you found the courage to ask,

"What?"

"Amethyst was about to eat you. But that's not all: apparently, you wanted to be eaten." she explained.

"I di- I mean, I will?" you asked, wondering how many Gems you were going to explore from the inside.

Realization dawned on you - Garnet wanted to do just that with you, didn't she?

"Yes. But as for now, I'd like to try it." Garnet repeated, before her face grew red... more red than it actually was, leading you to believe she was blushing,
"I've never seen a human this tiny willing to do such kind of things; you're certainly quite rare for your kind, and I wish you explore my inner self, describe things of me I don't even know."

Wow, this titaness did really love herself, you mused, but you knew that it was actually the two components of the fusion that felt a strong love for each other.

Apparently, Ruby and Sapphire wanted to discovered a brand new branch of their relationship with your aid.

"Okay, sure," you said with a shrug, offering a smile,
"I'll do it. I mean, I've already been inside of Pearl and everything's gone smoothly, so what's to fear?"

Garnet gave a smile.

"I anticipated this answer, but... I appreciate that." she said.

Then, before you knew it, you were moved towards her face while her mouth opened wide and nice, giving you a view of its slippery pink insides which you were soon going to see from up close.

Before you even knew it, you were dropped from the gem of Garnet's left hand to to inside of her mouth; her plump lips fell back in place, sealing you in darkness.

"Mhh..." you heard the Gem giantess moaning, her voice echoing all around you.

You looked around; initially, you couldn't see much, but your eyes gradually adjusted to the darkness so that you could make out the living insides of the Gem(s) you currently resided in. Your eyes fixed on the dark, deep abyss that was located at the very end of Garnet's mouth. You knew where that led, and you were quite curious to experience this little ‘tour’. After all, you journeyed through Pearl from ‘bottom to top’, now you felt eager to try it the other way around.

The tongue pulsed and shifted beneath you, and finally began moving around as Garnet started tasting your small self, her giant red muscle coating you in a thin layer of saliva; but, as your stay in her mouth grew prolonged, the layer of spittle surrounding you became thicker and thicker, until you were trapped in a blob so big you couldn't even move.

"... Garnet?" you called, wondering when she was going to swallow,
"Are you going to...?"

"Hmm..." was the giantess' reply, her mouth still too full of you to allow her to talk.

"I'm sorry, I didn't really understand..." you muttered while more saliva rained from the palate, soaking you.

Garnet didn't reply; instead, she acted.
15532221312232.title: Garnet's mouth

choices: Garnet gave you back to Pearl
Garnet wanted you to explore another part of her body
155322213122321.content:
Just like a building hit by a powerful earthquake, Garnet's mouth began tilting backwards. Your butt slid along her slick and squishy tongue as you were drawn towards the abyss you'd been staring at earlier, the same hole that led to the Gem's esophagus and, eventually, to her stomach.

If Garnet's was like Pearl's, you were safe, you told yourself.

You remained still as the powerful muscles of the esophagus gripped your left leg and began sucking you towards it; your other leg, and eventually your whole lower body, were sucked down, letting your upper body hit the slick surface of the tongue.

Saliva rained upon you again as you were drawn further down the throat.

You wondered how could someone take so much time swallowing their food, but you figured that Garnet was probably just savoring the experience as long as she could.

Eventually, your vision got eclipsed by the back of the Gem's mouth as the last of you disappeared into her throat, forming a noticeable lump on the other side of the giantess' neck.

Garnet smiled and blushed, placing two fingers on the lump that was Pearl's tiny catch, feeling you slide down her esophagus.

She didn't eat too often, no, and albeit very weirdly, she found the human she had just swallowed to be delicious.

Garnet traced your descent to her tummy with her fingers until your body slipped past her throat, in which point the lump disappeared.

As for you, you fell past a familiar opening that led you into a rather large chamber filled halfway with a colorless steaming liquid.

You fell straight into the pool of digestive acid, surfacing shortly after and spitting out said liquid before swimming to one of the fleshy, pulsing walls that surrounded you completely, keeping you from escaping and giving you only two ways out of here. And since the one above you had sealed shut, you guessed you were going to take the 'natural route' this time.

"So? How is it like in there? Make sure to tell me every little detail, little human." Garnet's voice echoed around you, causing the stomach walls to vibrate.

"Well, it's like a normal stomach... at least I think," you began,
"It's fleshy, and there's digestive acid, and it's very very hot... feels like a sauna in here..." you muttered, before looking up with newfound fear,
"... Are you 100% sure I'm going to be fine?"

The stomach walls were shaken again, this time because of a calm giggle.

"I don't know 'fleshy'. Gems' bodies are made of light. Imagine it was solid, that's how we are," she explained; from outside, the red and black giantess placed a hand on her stomach,
"Don't worry, you will be fine."

"I hope so..." you muttered, before proceeding to explain,
"Now, I'll be staying in here for a few hours before moving on to the intestines... digestion is quite slow."

Garnet's reply was very simple,

"We have time," she said,
"In the meantime, tell me more about this 'digestion'."

--

Much to your predictions, you were left trapped in Garnet's stomach for a few hours, killing your time by explaining the giantess how digestion worked and what you were going to face after your stay in the stomach.

The Gem seemed intrigued by your explanations and kept you talking, until the time to get out of the stomach came.

All of a sudden, a whirlpool formed in the middle of the stomach; you were drawn towards it and were dragged 'underwater' just before being pressed against a tight, though familiar hole.

Your body felt pain as the tight opening squeezed you; it was clearly too tight for you to squeeze through, but Garnet's body didn't care, it wanted you out.

Squeeze after squeeze, you were finally pulled through the opening and into a tight, dark tunnel that didn't allow you to stand.

Strong, squishy muscles clamped down on your soaked body while the opening sealed shut behind you, trapping you in the beginning of Garnet's intestines.

"Ow..." you muttered, your body feeling quite sore.

"Are you alright?" Garnet's voice came.

"Yeah..." you replied,
"Just a bit surprised... looks like I've finally moved to your intestines."

"Great. How is it like?" the giantess' you were trapped in asked, before giving another calm giggle,
"Keep in mind, you're the-"

"... First human to explore a Gem from the inside, yeah, I've heard that. And, to answer your question, it's like a dark, tight tunnel. I can't stand on my feet in here and..." you trailed off, taking notice of something you didn't notice before,
"... It's incredibly hot in here..."

The fusion remained silent for a moment.

"I think that's because of you, Ruby..." you heard her muttering to herself, before she addressed you again,
"Don't worry, you'll be fine." she reassured you like she did while you were in her stomach.

"Hm." you replied,
"Okay. I can't move now, so your body will have to move me until I... come out from the other end..." you explained, your cheeks flaring up.

"I'll wait. In the meantime, keep describing."

If you could move your shoulders, you would have shrugged,

"I've told everything, really... though there's no smell. It's supposed to be quite smelly in this part of the body... though I doubt any food would be able to confirm that."

Garnet giggled again.

The human trapped in her body was funny.

Perhaps this was what Rose had felt...

--

Once more, you were left stuck for quite awhile; you had lost track of time long ago, and didn't have any clue how close you were to the end of your journey through Garnet.

The Gem giantess kept on asking you to describe her insides with a hint of excitement in her quiet voice. You gladly contented her, albeit starting to feel a bit bored.

When you got out of here, you mused at some point, you hoped you could try something different, because going through someone's digestive system was starting to grow quite monotone.

Eventually, your body met yet another opening and was slowly squeezed through; there, in the darkness you've adjusted to long ago, you saw what appeared to be a wrinkled opening.

You sighed.

Your journey was at the end.

"I'm gonna get out soon enough," you informed Garnet.

Outside, the fusion of Ruby and Sapphire smiled,

"Was it enough of an experience, human?" she asked.

"A bit boring but... yeah, I think it's been kind of fun describing a living being from the inside..." you replied while your body traveled deeper, towards the very end of Garnet.

Soon, you came to the point where your body was touching the anus.

"Here we go..." you told as the hole began pulsing around you; the top of your head was slowly taken by the orifice, before your whole head was taken out.

You looked down, noticing that you were stuck from your neck down in a dark red hole, which kept on pushing you... the process was cut short when two red fingers came to you, gripped the sides of your head and pulled you out of Garnet's butt like one would with a cork on a bottle.

The same fingers brought you back to the giantess' smiling face.

"Well, it's been an experience, wouldn't you agree?" she chimed while using her free hand to remove her glasses from her three eyes, which, you noted, were of different colors: red, blue and purple.

"Yeah," you admitted,
"Just a bit... monotone, once you get used to it. What now?" you then asked.
155322213122321.title: Garnet's interior

15532222223332211.title: Someone from Final Fantasy VII

155322222233322111.content:
You’ve been a fan of video game girls - especially the ones from Final Fantasy VII - for as long as you can remember. But lately, you’ve developed a thing for the concept of exploring one of these girls from the inside! And thus, through a process too long and complex to explain at the moment, you have created a shrinking submarine-like vehicle that can teleport to other worlds - all for the sole purpose of fulfilling your endosomatophilic dream.

Some hobby, huh?

Entering your vessel, you press a few buttons in front of you and, in mere seconds, ZAP! You find yourself in what looks to be a gigantic bedroom. The furniture looks nice and cozy, but whoever owns this house hasn’t overdone it.

Speaking of which, the door opens slowly, prompting you to guide your sub under the bed as you see your host-to-be enter the room...Tifa Lockhart! Her dark hair, cute facial features, and exposed midriff quickly catch your attention as Tifa lets out a yawn and lays down in her bed for an apparent nap. This is your chance!

You hover your vehicle over the sleeping giantess’s bare belly, contemplating your options. You could enter her mouth, her ear, her nose...the possibilities are driving your hormones wild!
155322222233322111.title: Tifa’s Tiny Intruder

1553222222333221111.content:
As your sub floats over the bare midriff of the sleeping Tifa, you settle on a way to enter her body. Hitting the thrusters, you launch past the giantess's slightly-parted lips and into the moist darkness of her mouth, which closes just after your entry. Your new surroundings are strangely beautiful...the pearly-white teeth behind you seem like an impenetrable gate; the tongue below lies dormant as you notice many tiny lumps -- Tifa's taste buds, you assume. And just ahead is the lightless abyss of her throat...you could slide down her esophagus and into her stomach, or perhaps squeeze through her trachea and into one of her lungs!

Better make a choice before your hostess wakes up and feels you!

info.brief_description: You shrink down and explore the body a girl from a show, movie, game, etc. inside and out!
info.description:
You build a spaceship like vehicle that can shrink down and explore the bodies of girls from various cartoons, movies, video games, anime, animated movies, and the like!

Rules:

* You can give choices for more than one girl from another show or movie if said property has more than one major female character.
* Girls from live-action properties now allowed!
* Anthro/furry characters not really encouraged. Humanoids like aliens or such are ok though.
* Full tour is allowed and encouraged.
* Sex scenes and/or nudity involving you and any of the girls is fine.
* Must have good grammar and decently descriptive chapters, no short, one-sentence stuff unless it's for choosing a girl to serve as a host.
* When starting a first chapter involving any chosen girl, you have to detail how you find them and end up inside or at least on her body. No restrictions on orifices to enter through.
* No feet stuff.
* No male giants.
* Digestion allowed on occasion, just no scat please.
* Characters have to be at least teenagers or older (characters like original-series-era Gwen Tennyson or Mable Pines are OK, but they are the ONLY exceptions because they're popular). Any younger is not allowed.

Please add if you can! This is my first interactive in many years and I don't like being the only one to be adding chapters!
